title: Moon in Leo
summary: A bright emotional climate that seeks expression and affirmation. Feelings want to be shared openly, and energy rises with play, creativity, and being witnessed.

meaning.headline: Emotions lean theatrical, warm, and eager to be seen.

frames.text: With the Moon in Leo, moods grow more expressive and bold.
Attention gravitates toward celebration, creativity, and recognition.
Everyone needs applause or validation right now.

frictions: Comparing attention levels instead of collaborating
opportunities: Presenting work in a way that feels fun

do: Offer sincere praise where it is due.
Show your work in progress instead of hiding it.
Add playful breaks to refuel energy.
Lead with warmth when making requests.
Check in with your body before pushing through for applause.

reusable_lines.text: The mood is expressive and craves warm connection today.
A little celebration goes a long way under this sky.

forbidden_claims: Deterministic claims about pride or ego
allowed_framing: Environmental focus on expression and warmth
Agency-based choices about visibility and rest
Contextual language about play and encouragement

sources: Moon in Leo as short-term climate of expression
